category.name: Solution-Specific.Mechatronics

preference.name: TC_releasable_logical_types
preference.preference_description: Specifies which releasable logical types are displayed in the Process Selector dialog box. The dialog box lists unreleased logical components of a selected assembly. Valid Values: Accepts multiple strings as values. Each string must be a valid release type.
